gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.OneD
Interface IViewComponent1D

All Superinterfaces:
IPreserveState, IViewComponent
All Known Implementing Classes:
FunctionViewComponent
public interface IViewComponent1D
extends IViewComponent

This interface extends IViewComponent to the specific case of classes that display lists of functions. Any class that implements this interface will interpret and display data in a usable form. Examples include images, tables, and graphs.

Method Detail

dataChanged

void dataChanged(IVirtualArrayList1D pin_varray)
This method changes the array of data being displayed and updates the display accordingly.

Parameters:
pin_varray - The IVirtualArrayList1D containing the new data.

setPointedAt

void setPointedAt(floatPoint2D pt)
This method can be called by other classes to specify a position in "world coordinates" as the currently pointed at location.

Parameters:
pt - The "world coordinates" of the point being specified as the pointed at location.

getPointedAt

floatPoint2D getPointedAt()
Returns the point in "world coordinates" of the point that is being pointed at in this viewer.
